mapper.sql: a.ATN_ID AS a_atn_id, a.EMP_ID AS a_emp_id, a.ATN_DATE AS a_atn_date, a.ATN_IN AS a_atn_in, a.ATN_OUT AS a_atn_out, a.ATN_STATUS AS a_atn_status
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN ATN_STATUS = '출근' THEN 1 END) as ONTIME, COUNT(CASE WHEN ATN_STATUS = '지각' THEN 1 END) as LATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN ATN_STATUS = '결근' THEN 1 END) as ABSENT, COUNT(CASE WHEN ATN_STATUS = '미처리' THEN 1 END) as UNPROCESSED FROM attendance WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance (ATN_ID, EMP_ID, ATN_DATE, ATN_IN, ATN_OUT, ATN_STATUS) VALUES (#{atnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empId}, #{atnDate}, #{atnIn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{atnOut,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{atnStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
